xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/785984-Celebrity Train Layouts Part 3: Mandy Patinkin 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Describes Mandy Patinkin's train layout which features a freight yard, mountains, animated carnival, operating ski lift, scale structures, and parallel mainlines with sweeping curves. Mandy operates a mix of Lionel's Modern Era, including the 2343 Santa Fe F3 re-issue from 1996, Amtrak GG1, 490 C & O Hudson, Illinois Central 8580 F3 passenger set from 1985, and a 2380 NYC Geep. Celebrity Train Layouts Part 3: Mandy Patinkin
